short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View multiple files inside a GitHub review without clicking one thousand times.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing our new Chrome extension â€“ a simple but powerful utility designed to bring efficiency and convenience to your GitHub PR review process!
Key Features:
	1.	Bulk Marking of Files as Viewed: This feature allows you to mark all files in your PR as "viewed" with just a single click. Thus, eliminating the hassle of manually clicking each file, especially in large and complex projects.
	2.	Bulk Marking of Files as Unviewed: Realized you went through the files too quickly or need to review the PR again for your peace of mind? This feature lets you instantly mark all files as "unviewed". With one click, you are ready for your re-review!
	3.	Selective Bulk Viewing/Unviewing Based on Regex: This cutting-edge feature gives you the ability to mark multiple files as 'viewed' or 'unviewed', based on a regex pattern. Just input the regexp pattern that matches the criteria of the files you want to view or unview. For instance, to mark all files in a specific directory or all files of a certain type, you simply utilize the relevant regexp. It's all about streamlining your file navigation and making the review process a breeze!
